description:
All info Server Linux

InfluxDB , Telegraf, Linux,

targets.query: SELECT mean("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM "system"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("inodes_used") * 100) / mean("inodes_total") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "path" =~ /^$path$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ and cpu = '$cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ and cpu = '$cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used", mean(free) as "free" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path", "device", "fstype" fill(null)

SELECT mean(inodes_total) as "total", mean(inodes_free) as "free", mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean("inodes_free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path", "device", "fstype" fill(null)
SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_indatagrams), 1s) as "in datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_outdatagrams), 1s) as "out datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_outrsts), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_activeopens), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_passiveopens), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(processes_forked),1s) as forks FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-max") as max FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-nr") as opened FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT host, pid, memory_vms, memory_rss, memory_swap, cpu_usage, cpu_time_user, process_name FROM "procstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

title: System InfluxDB Host Telegraf
